Articles.Content:
I want to see someone build a ship big enough to escape Jools atmosphere from the ground yet small enough to survive the pressure! or just build a base on jool with at least 5 buildings! I f you don't believe you can land on Jool read this:

It is possible to land on its solid surface (http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Jool).

Please post pics of you fails/accomplishments.

Also i will allow people to use infinite fuel going to Jool. but not the landing and taking off, ONLY if you are escaping. if you are making a base do it legit.

I post my own attempt here too.

Edited October 31, 2013 by krona14
yes, and it is possible, i have gotten 3/4 out of Jools atmosphere with a spaceplane
What about escaping Eve from the surface?

krona14 you already had an identical challenge locked, read the rules and post comprehensive evidence that your challenge is possible if you wish to create a new one. Specifically because your challenge would by most be regarded as impossible.

Locked.
